  • Implemented {{cssxref("<percentage>")}} for the grid-gap, grid-row-gap, and grid-column-gap properties (Firefox bug 1266268).
    • > |
  • Implemented grid layout support for {{cssxref("align")}}, {{cssxref("justify-self")}}:baseline and last-baseline (aka "baseline self-alignment") (Firefox bug 1221525).
    • ^ |
  • Implemented grid item baseline content alignment (Firefox bug 1256429).

title: Firefox 49 for developers
summary: To test the latest developer features of Firefox, install Firefox Developer Edition Firefox 49 was released on September 20, 2016. This article lists key changes that are useful not only for web developers, but also Firefox and Gecko developers as well as add-on developers.
